title: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 Core i3 10th Gen - (8 GB/1 TB HDD/Windows 10 Home) 15IML05 Thin and Light Laptop  (15.6 inch, Platinum Grey, 1.7 kg, With MS Office)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 2.1 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 4.1 GHz
product_specification.Sound Properties: 2 x 1.5W Stereo Speakers with Dolby Audio

product_description.Sleek and Stylish: If you're someone who's always on the move, the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim Laptop is ideal for you. Weighing 1.7 kg and designed with a 19.9 mm slim body, it is portable and sure to grab eyeballs everywhere you go.
product_description.Superior Performance: You can experience seamless performance while using this laptop, as it features a powerful Intel Core 10th Gen processor. And, thanks to its 8 GB RAM and 1 TB HDD, this laptop not only lets you run several apps at once but also offers ample storage capacity.
product_description.High-quality Visuals: Featuring a 39.624 cm (15.6) FHD anti-glare display, this laptop delivers sharp and clear images. In addition, sporting two-sided narrow bezels, this laptop lets you see more of the screen size for an engaging viewing experience.
product_description.Immersive Aural Experience: Courtesy of Dolby Audio, this laptop renders high-quality surround sound that enhances your overall experience when you play video games or watch movies, series, and live sports.
product_description.High-performance Battery: With a long-lasting battery, this laptop lets you work, study or play games without any hindrance. Furthermore, with Q-Control, its Max mode offers high-speed performance whereas the Battery Saving Mode makes sure you don’t run out of juice.
product_description.Fast Connectivity: The 2x2 Wi-Fi 5 of this laptop ensures that you can stream online content, attend conference calls and class, and play online games without any hassles. And, the Bluetooth 5.0 version makes it easy for you to rapidly connect your laptop to other compatible devices.
product_description.Additional Features: Equipped with Lenovo Vantage, this laptop features several other features, such as charging thresholds, power management, and regular software updates to optimise its performance and enjoy a user-friendly experience.
